img_summary: The image is from a video game equipment menu, showcasing the "Scorpion Prince" spirit. This spirit allows the player to transform into a Scorpion Guai, using the "Deathsting" ability to pierce enemies and inflict poison damage in a small area. The equipped effect moderately increases poison damage, which is useful in battles where the player might get poisoned. The menu provides options to equip the spirit and view a demonstration of its abilities.
